snippet.title: Stoneman's Adventure - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
a simple game trailer for INDIE Live Expo Winter 2023
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hey everyone, after a long period of development, my game Stoneman's Adventure is out on STEAM and ITCH.IO!
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2434860/Stonemans_Adventure/
ITCH.IO: https://akacmd.itch.io/stoneman-adventure

Stoneman's Adventure is a 3d puzzle game whose gameplay is an unique combination of sokoban and one-line drawing. Embark on an adventure as a stoneman on an island filled with puzzles and secrets.

The game is priced at the cost of a cheap coffee, and you can also try the demo first. 

Give it a try and appreciate all of the feedback!
